properties.sfomuseum:creditline: Gift of David A. Abercrombie in memory of Stanley A. Abercrombie
properties.sfomuseum:description: Inflight information brochure issued by Northwest Orient Airlines, titled "Welcome Aboard"; multipage booklet; white cover with color illustration of aircraft in flight over city; contains information about aircraft fleet, meal service, cargo, with color photographic images and route maps.
properties.wof:name: flight information brochure: Northwest Orient Airlines
